title: PhilGEPS Contract Award
description: Schema for records in data/philgeps/philgeps.parquet (PhilGEPS contract awards extract). Each object represents a single awarded contract.

id.description: Primary key for this record. Derived from a 16-byte internal identifier in the source system.

reference_id.description: PhilGEPS opportunity/reference ID for this procurement (as displayed on PhilGEPS portal).

contract_no.description: Contract number or internal control number, if provided by the procuring entity.

award_title.description: Title of the awarded contract (often mirrors the notice title).

notice_title.description: Original notice title published in PhilGEPS.
examples: Supply and Delivery of ICT Equipment

awardee_name.description: Name of the winning supplier/contractor as listed in PhilGEPS.

organization_name.description: Name of the procuring entity/organization that issued the notice.
examples: Department of Public Works and Highways - Region IV-A
Department of Education - Division of Quezon City

area_of_delivery.description: Free-text description of the area/place of delivery or project location as provided in PhilGEPS.

business_category.description: Primary business category of the procurement (as categorized in PhilGEPS).

contract_amount.description: Total contract amount in Philippine Peso (PHP). Stored as a floating-point number in the parquet source.

award_date.description: Date and time the contract was awarded, in ISO 8601 format (converted from timestamp in parquet).

award_status.description: Status of the award record (e.g., Active, Cancelled, Failed). Values are taken directly from PhilGEPS.
